headline: A look at Estée Lauder’s valuation as fresh analyst upgrades highlight its ‘Beauty Reimagined’ turnaround story
summary: Estée Lauder Companies (EL) just caught fresh attention after a rare double upgrade from Morgan Stanley and a renewed vote of confidence from Bank of America tied to its Beauty Reimagined turnaround plan. See our latest analysis for Estée Lauder Companies. The bullish calls are landing on a stock that already had momentum, with a 30 day share price return of 18.38 percent and a year to date share price gain of 41.11 percent, even though the 3 year total shareholder return is still deeply...
